Room.Name: Level One Circular Hallway/Apstone Tunnel Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Apstone Tunnel and the circular hallway.
Room.LongDescription: Apstone Tunnel leads in a northwest direction towards the center courtyard. The tunnel carries the name of a very talented and very old wizard who has chosen to support the claim of Prince Rutger against his brother, Prince Ragnar. Apstone believes that it is Rutger who has a lawful claim to the crown at Lyanden.
